text: Does anybody know if it's possible to use npm packages on a custom workflow action? :slightly_smiling_face: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>

There are a few packages available for custom code workflow action as seen here:
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/workflows/custom-code-actions>

The curstom workflow actions are only definitions on HubSpot side - the actual processing would happen in your application and therefore has all npm packages available.
